website_summaries.verdict: For fans of the Air Max shoes, the Nike Air Max Plus does not disappoint us with its relative comfort and well-positioned Tuned Air cushioning system, support and stability.The great fitting and lockdown, as well as new colorways of Air Max Plus releases from Nike, have made sneaker fans continually anticipating the next installments of this popular Air-cushioned sneaker. However, fans should watch out for manufacturing issues that can affect looks that some may dismiss as a minor issue.
pros: A significant number of users find that the Nike Air Max Plus offers a good lockdown fit
A lot of users find the new colorways of the late 1990s classic sneakers stylish, trendy and fashionable even for the younger generation
The Air cushioning of the Air Max Plus shoes in the heel and forefoot make every step comfortable, according to the majority of its users
It provides satisfactory ankle support, several users have reported
Quite a lot claim the shoe is very lightweight
A lot of buyers love the OG colorways that bring a nostalgic feeling
Numerous reviewers say that air circulates well on the breathable textile upper material
Some comment that the rubber outsole has an excellent grip on the ground
cons: Some customers find issues on quality control, poor finishing, and assembly of some of their shoes
A review notes that the shoe needed breaking in the collar, tongue and lace part to be comfortable as it is too stiff at first use

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit was perfect shoe was just as is in picture.

customer_reviews.title: The hot punch part of these shoes looks kinda red ...
customer_reviews.text: The hot punch part of these shoes looks kinda red on the advertised picture, however once I got them in the mail they came out a lighter color than hot punch as described on the pic and more as of pink. I am not big fan of pink....

customer_reviews.title: I buy 2 pairs a year!

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Air Max Plus Gymnastics Shoes
product_meta.description: COMFORT, SUPPORT AND CUSHIONING. The Nike Air Max Plus Men's Shoe maintains the legendary "Tuned" Air cushioning and energetic lines of the original 1998 model. Upper in leather, synthetic material or fabric based on color; foam sole with Tuned Air cushioning; rubber sole. Origins of the Air Max Plus shoe: the revolutionary Air-Sole unit debuted in the Nike Footwear line in 1978. The 1987 marks the debut of the Nike Air Max 1, the first model with visible Air unit in the heel, which shows the fans the characteristics of the new technology , in addition to offering all the typical benefits of Air-Sole. In 1998, Air Max Plus introduced the cushioning system that "tuned" the Air-Sole units with specific parts of the foot, to give greater stability and support to runners. Thanks to the sunset-inspired colorways and wavy design lines, which recall the beaches caressed by the wind, this shoe has gained such popularity that it soon turned into a real cultural phenomenon.
